resources.string: Place QR code in scanner box

● Joined election: When you have joined the election. 
● Voting started: Voting period has begun. You can now begin to cast your vote. 
● Vote casted: You have casted your vote. 
● Vote recorded: Your vote has been recorded to the blockchain and can be guaranteed to be counted in the final result. 
● Results calculated: The final result has been calculated.
Others are still joining the election, you can join the election at DD/MM/YY HH:MM.
Your vote has been casted and is in the process of being recorded to the blockchain. To learn more go to the FAQ.
